July 1977 Asahiza: The Maiden's Colorful Fan

Plays:

The Maiden's Colorful Fan (極彩色娘扇)

Scenes:

Eitai Riverside at Utsubo (靱永代浜)

Hyosuke's House (兵助内 (天王寺村兵助内))

The Masui Well (増井)

Characters:

Hyosuke's mother (母お幸)

Hyosuke (寺子屋兵助)

Fudematsu (伜筆松)

Otsuru, Tobei's wife (女房おつる)

Ohaya (手習子お早)

Ohana (手習子お花)

Omaki, Hyosuke's wife (女房お牧)

Gambei (兄眼兵衛)

Dampachi (手代段八)

Tobei (朝日奈藤兵衛)

School children (手習子)
